review:
Highly recommend n very much approachable.
For my Kid Chaarvi 5 year had a very bad vomit n loose motions ( 10 V n 12 L Motions) n stomach pain ..her Dr. at Motherhood hospital was unavailable as on leave n the duty doctor didn't help much n insisted in online call with another pediatrician in motherhood who was not available till late that evening. I was clueless n worried ..
One of my friends suggested me Dr. J K Reddy... n forwarded his contact.
I messaged the Dr. About the situation n to my surprise he messaged back after 30 min with medication. I worked on that n updated him the next day. He keep suggested me few more medicine n helped a lot with the situation. Today is day 5 n my child is much better.  Thanks to the Dr.
Every Dr. Start thinking like Dr. J K Reddy ...kids world will rock. Kids need immediate attention..can keep dragging n wait for one day or two n then action ...things can get worsen if not acted on that.  This i have experience with motherhood hospital....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This  place is unique. My son(3.5 years) is born in USA & we came back to India when he was around 7 months old, since then Dr.Reddy is his Peds. I find no difference in the treatment / vaccination chart what we had been given in the past in USA.
Being a first time mommy, I always have too many questions(most of them are usually silly), but this doctor never gets annoyed & ensures that he gives me a detailed picture of what it is in layman terms, which is always a big relief to me.
Irrespective of time he supports. Online or offline his treatment is genuine. He keeps things simple rather exaggerating but at the same time he also ensure he doesn't miss any tests.
Another speciality is he is master in poking, kids give no reaction when he pokes, I wish I had one such doc when I was kid.
He is fluent in many languages & that is again one more advantage for kids to mingle much better. As I have seen him for last few years, he treats all children as same as his own child.
He has designed this clinic in a way that every kid loves to spend time. That also shows how well he has understood kids. Infact my son thinks that this is a fun place and asks me every now & then to take him there.
After all this,  I should also be honest that he charges way too less for the hospitality, treatment, support, care he offers.
Undoubtedly, Dr.Reddy is a godsend.

He is the pediatrician  for both my daughters . Wonderful doctor and a great human being . He gives the right medicine when needed and prescribes  antibiotics only when absolutely necessary .  Unlike  many doctors  he is friendly and easily approachable . We are lucky to have him as our doctor . Demi god is how see him üôåüèΩ

********* ********* ****** ... My son best friend ... He is a happy man treat my son with more love üíï highly recommended best doctor. My son will get cure by meeting him ** ** * ***** ***.... Thank you so much doctor. I see you like a god üôè

Fortunate to meet you sir....just last visited yesterday in hospitalI am 100 percent satisfied...i am from Agartala Tripura...I have come here after seeing reviews on him...as I heard I saw more than what I heard..you are good human being..don't prescribe unnecessary medicine and test..We wish we had such doctor and hospital...apart from them I would like to share I got a great experience from appollo child hospital *** ****** ********** **** ****** ******** ****** **** *********** ****** *********** **** ** **** ********

*** **** ** *** *** *** *** **** **** *** Very approachable at any time. 
- Understands your kid.
- gives medicines only based on need.
- playful and loved by kids.
Ever smiling , treats kids with great love , never loads the kids with abnormal medicines . Strongly strongly recommend .
Kids friendly‚Ä¶ They way he manage the patients‚Ä¶ explains very well about disease & the treatment going to be held‚Ä¶.

review: It was a great experience to meet doctor jk reddy..the way he handles kid was just amazing ...never seen a doctor like him so far..very very happy
